in the running plant. I have been associated with GVRINFRA PROJECTS LTD  in India Ltd. since June 2011
Objective:

that  i  am  a friendly,  outgoing  and dependable  person.  I  feel it  is crucial  to demonstrate the
importance of my job duties and expectations. I am looking to improve my position in the work
force, expand my knowledge and skills. I am also looking to establish long term employment in a
friendly environment.

Core Activities Performed in GVRINFRA PROJECTS  Ltd are :
 Looking after breakdown maintenance daily and taking corrective actions to minimize down time 
of plant.
Managing work men according to the daily preventive maintenance schedule and attacking the 
daily problems online.
Planning and monitoring of shut down works to minimize plant down time.
Interacting with vendor’s to complete the necessary works and new installations in plant.
Contributing and taking initiation in Welding and Gas cutting works when on crisis situations.Daily equipment checking according to check list.
Analyzing the break downs by discussing with department head 
Spare parts maintenance in advance in the heart core locations of the plant.
